function.name: finish

args.final_thought:
The simpo_loss function in SimPOTrainer has been implemented according to the SimPO paper. The loss uses the length-normalized average log probability as the reward, applies the beta scaling, and enforces a margin (gamma) in the Bradley-Terry objective as described in the paper. The implementation is minimal and only affects the required function, as requested.

If you need further testing, integration, or have additional tasks, please let me know!
